name: Ingles Markets, Incorporated
description: Ingles Markets, Incorporated is a regional supermarket chain based in the southeastern United States, primarily serving customers in North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia, Tennessee, and Virginia. Founded in 1963 by Robert P. Ingles, Sr., the company has established a strong reputation for providing high-quality products and exceptional customer service. Ingles operates a network of over 200 supermarkets, offering a wide range of products, including groceries, fresh produce, meats, bakery items, and dairy products. The chain also features a selection of pharmacy services and fuel centers. Ingles is known for its commitment to sourcing local products and supporting local farmers, which enhances its community presence and supports regional economies. The company prides itself on its friendly and knowledgeable staff, ensuring a pleasant shopping experience for customers. With a focus on quality and value, Ingles continues to expand its footprint while adapting to the changing needs of consumers, including the integration of online shopping and delivery services. As a family-owned business, Ingles maintains a strong corporate culture centered around integrity and community involvement. The company aims to be a responsible corporate citizen while delivering long-term value to its shareholders.

seo.meta_title: Ingles Markets, Incorporated | Quality Grocery Retailer
seo.meta_description: Discover Ingles Markets, a family-owned grocery chain dedicated to quality products and exceptional service. Explore our supermarkets and find your local store.

faq.question: What does Ingles Markets offer?
faq.answer: Ingles Markets offers a variety of grocery items, fresh produce, pharmacy services, and fuel.

faq.question: Where is Ingles headquartered?
faq.answer: Ingles is headquartered in Asheville, North Carolina, USA.

faq.question: What is the focus of Ingles Markets?
faq.answer: Ingles focuses on providing quality products, exceptional customer service, and supporting local farmers.
